dmca.title: Music DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Twitter
dmca.body:
RIAAAntipiracy, Jul-13 08:30 am (PDT):

Tell us about yourself: I am an authorized representative of the copyright owner.
Copyright owner's full name: Universal Music Group (authorized representative: Recording Industry Association of America, Inc.)
Your full name: [redacted]
Job title: Online Anti-Piracy, RIAA

Email address: [redacted]
Street address: [redacted]
City: Washington
State/Province: DC
Postal code: 20004
Country: USA
Phone number(optional): [redacted]
Fax number(optional): [redacted]

Description of original work: Sound recordings as performed by the artists known as Lil Wayne, Nicki Minaj, The Game, Rihanna, 2Pac, Drake, and Kanye West.

Reported Twitter account: JumpInBlack
Description of Infringement: This account is providing access to unauthorized copies of sound and video recordings owned by an RIAA member company.
Type of infringing material: n/a
Type of infringing material: n/a
Type of infringing material: Tweets
Specific Tweets: http://twitter.com/#!/JumpInBlack/status/90758985036210176
http://twitter.com/#!/JumpInBlack/status/90332707317489664
http://twitter.com/#!/JumpInBlack/status/90332172069777408
http://twitter.com/#!/JumpInBlack/status/90330810011496448
http://twitter.com/#!/JumpInBlack/status/89241125419876352
http://twitter.com/#!/JumpInBlack/status/88863197586657280
http://twitter.com/#!/JumpInBlack/status/88861353703510016
http://twitter.com/#!/JumpInBlack/status/88653948331888641
http://twitter.com/#!/JumpInBlack/status/88192014428020736
http://twitter.com/#!/JumpInBlack/status/88191966684254208
http://twitter.com/#!/JumpInBlack/status/87762494248071169

512(f) Acknowledgment: I understand that under 17 U.S.C. Â§ 512(f), I may be liable for any damages, including costs and attorneys' fees, if I knowingly materially misrepresent that reported material or activity is infringing.

Good Faith Belief: I have good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

Authority to Act: The information in this notification is accurate, and I state under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner.

Signature: [redacted]
